steps.description: Check for responsiveness and call emergency services immediately if unresponsive.
Check the pulse using the carotid artery (neck).
Place the child on a flat surface and start chest compressions.
Use one hand for compressions, pressing about 2 inches deep at a rate of 100â€“120 per minute.
After 30 compressions, open the airway using the head-tilt, chin-lift method.
Give 2 rescue breaths, watching for chest rise.
Repeat the cycle until help arrives or child starts breathing.
